website_summaries.verdict: Formulated with unique Damage Defense Complex to prevent irritation and offer a smooth and comfortable shaving experience.
pros: Reduces irritation and redness caused by razor burns
Also works as a pre-shave oil
cons: You need to use a lot of cream for a close shave

customer_reviews.title: Ne plus ultra
customer_reviews.text: I would guess I've probably tried at least 40 different types of shaving creams and lotions over the years. Keep coming back to this one. Not cheap but the consistency is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Emma

customer_reviews.title: Best shaving cream I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Best shaving cream I have ever tried. Compact form: a feel drops will do for a whole shave. Smooth shave. And wash quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Luan Ngo-Tran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shaving cream I have tried. Smooth with zero irritation or drag.
customer_reviews.author: Fred G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shaving cream and he is not into creams or anything. He buys whatever he finds at the supermarket but I got this on sale at our base and gave it to him to try and now it's a must have for the past 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: girllovesdeals

customer_reviews.title: Sheseido shaving cream for men is the greatest!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin that scales when I shave preventing a close shave. Shiseido men's shaving cream is the only thing I've found that gives me a close shave without any razor burn or cuts!
customer_reviews.author: ges111

customer_reviews.title: Best non-foaming shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: A shaving cream must, above all, help water to wet your beard. Next it must not irritate the skin. The Shiseido product is an excellent wetting agent, and actually soothes the skin -- no aftershave lotion needed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product ... High price point and not a lot of product
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Best shaving cream I have ever used. I was given a small sample and immediately hooked. Don't worry about the cost. This tube will last me at least four months, probably six. Only need a dab about the size of two peas to shave. Just be sure to match it up with a nice Merkur double edge razor.
customer_reviews.author: Stuck in New England

customer_reviews.title: Good skin product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend a couple of years ago and he simply loves it. He said that this gives him the best shave .
customer_reviews.author: Ann  Lajuan

customer_reviews.title: This product will make your skin healthier
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product - my boyfriend says he will never go back to any ordinary shaving cream! You really have to try it! It's a very high quality product line - after shave lotion, etc etc. I will purchase fr this Seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Masha M

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido products are good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good shaving cream, I am shocked. It causes no irritation, and no burns. It feels good after the shave; smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Navin Puri

customer_reviews.title: I do not think it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was not really impressed of the quality of the shave for the price. I have gotten as good of results from more inexpensive shave creams/gels.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was shocked at how unimpressed I was with this product. I shave my face in the shower and have almost always used my bar of Dove soap. Felt like trying something new. Lathered it up, let it sit for awhile and started to shave. Rough and pulling sensation. Thought it was the blade. Changed blades and started over. Same thing. Washed off reapplied to one side and used the Dove soap on the other. Dove side was smooth as always, Shiseido side was rough and unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: MinFLA

customer_reviews.title: I've really liked all the other shiseido products that I've tried but ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't too impressed with this stuff. I've really liked all the other shiseido products that I've tried but I wouldn't buy this one again. I get a better shave with a $4 can of aveeno for men shave cream.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer R.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: This is a creme not a gel and it doesn’t have any foam and barely shields your face from razor burn. Frankly the cheaper stuff over the counter Gives a smoother shave.
customer_reviews.author: slowbutsure

product_meta.title: Shiseido Men Shaving Cream for Men, 3.6 Ounce
product_meta.description: Gives smooth and comfortable shaving experience. Softens even the thickest beard or dry skin. Minimizes razor burn and easily rinses off. Leaves skin a moist film for protection.
feature_bullets: Gives smooth and comfortable shaving experience.
Softens even the thickest beard or dry skin.
Minimizes razor burn and easily rinses off.
